createUser: create table usertable (ID INTEGER AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT '主键', USERNAME VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '账号', PSW VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '密码', SEX VARCHAR(1) COMMENT '性别', EMAIL VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '邮箱', NICKNAME VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '昵称')
insertUser: insert into usertable (USERNAME, PSW, SEX, EMAIL, NICKNAME) values
